author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Made <lockdiscover> property check RFC client test work.

author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Adjusted authorization check in the back end to return 401, in case the user
was not logged in at all, or 403, if the authenticated user does not have

author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Make failing lock RFC test work.
- Changed error response code returned if an authenticated user does not have
access to a resource from 401 to 403.
# I finally found an example in the RFC that indicates the code.
- Added <lockdiscovery> property state to the multi status response returned,
if any pre-conditions for a lock or locked operation failed.
